author: Andreas
content:
Hi Andreas!

Now, I seriously turned red reading my name on your fantastic blog!

Indeed, I am a silent but admiring visitor for almost half a year now - having a link to your feed in the menu of my browser it became a little habit to surf through your latest additions, most of them taking my breath - seriously!
Your style and explanations were (and still are) a great inspiration for my (re)start as hobby photographer.
Also, I admire your persistence to post one picture every day!

It was a great pleasure to meet you (both) after such a long time, and both events, your exhibition and the concert were nice occasions to have a chat.

At least parts of the concert will be published hopefully within this year, maybe we can clear the rights to use some snippets to be combined with a slideshow of your pictures!

All the best,

Andreas
